repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Bitcoin (dont fork from here, fork from bitcoin/bitcoin)

events.message: No reason to have any qrcode stuff in the bitcoind osx makefile.
Add libqrencode-dev to the debian/ubuntu apt-get lines.
Fix Linux gitian descriptor to use QRCode support.

events.body:
More to come...
(Win32 gitian stuff is a pain as it requires libpng and its deps...)
Don't get too execited acking yet...I thought I would have the win32 gitian stuff done quick but I got distracted and also need to do libzlib and libpng.

events.message: Add QR Code support to Win32 Gitian build.

events.body: OK, that should work (though I havent tested the win32 stuff, just wrote it and got it to compile myself outside of gitian)...
Also, ACK on the added commit. Can't personally test, but it looks sound and simple.
